titleStmt.title: A letter from a friend in Shropshire to his country-man Mr. Richard Baxter at his meeting-house in London
titleStmt.author: J. M.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: J.M. Oswalstree in the county of Salop, July 20, 1681.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
